import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { getAuth, signInWithEmailAndPassword } from 'firebase/auth'; import { app } from '../firebase'; import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; const auth = getAuth(app); const Login = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setpassword] = useState(''); const auth = getAuth(); // Initialize Firebase auth const handleLogin = async (e) => { try { // Sign in using Firebase Authentication await signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth, email, password); toast.success("Login") // Redirect to the dashboard or another page upon successful login window.location.href = 'Profile'; } catch (error) { console.error('Login error:', error); // Handle and display login error } }; return (
